items.title: Perplexity offers free AI tools to students worldwide in partnership with SheerID
items.description: Perplexity and SheerID launch a global program offering students up to two years of free AI access through secure identity verification.

items.title: Anthropic launches finance-specific Claude with built-in data connectors, higher limits and prompt libraries
items.description: Anthropic is unveiling a financial sector-specific Claude version that will tackle data connectors and added rate limits for analysts.

items.title: Amazon launches Kiro, its own Claude-powered challenger to Windsurf and Codex
items.description: Initial community reactions to Kiro were mixed, but developers were intrigued, praising the emphasis on specs, hooks and structure.

items.title: Remaining Windsurf team and tech acquired by Cognition, makers of Devin: ‘We’re friends with Anthropic again’
items.description: Cognition CEO Scott Wu and interim Windsurf CEO Jeff Wang said they would start by integrating the AI-powered engineer Devin into Windsurf.

items.title: AI’s fourth wave is here — are enterprises ready for what’s next?
items.description: To maintain competitive advantage through the next five years, which innovations must forward-thinking companies prioritize right now?
